remarks: The order dual generates the same topology as the original order. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Sep-2015.)  (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 13-Sep-2018.)
statement:
ordtNEW.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
ordtNEW.l $e |- .<_ = ( ( le ` K ) i^i ( B X. B ) ) $.
ordtcnvNEW $p |- ( K e. Preset -> ( ordTop ` `' .<_ ) = ( ordTop ` .<_ ) ) $.
